entries.femaleVariant: Hey y'all, welcome to Infoflash. Say, did ya hear Rosalind Myers is running for a fourth term?
Yeah, she made the announcement at the last Militech shareholders' meeting... Ah-hahah... I mean Federalist Party convention.
Now, this might seem to be unconstitutional...
But Myers has compared herself to Franklin D. Roosevelt who also served as US Prez for four terms.
And honestly, yeah, I can see the resemblance.
Myers ended up choosing "A Return to Unity" as her campaign slogan, but there were some real contenders... Like "Arasaka, Return to Tokyo!" or "To Hell With Texas."
She's promised her constituents to, quote, "continue the effort to unify our United States." Though, might wanna read that as "hope y'all are ready for another war!"
What, you wanted a punchline? That wasn't a joke. We're all gonna die.
Hahaha, gotcha! Of course, not all of us will. I own a bunker. I'll survive.
Well, on that note, that's it for today's Infoflash. Sleep tight, Night City.
